directions: In a medium bowl, mix soy sauce, red wine vinegar, white wine, honey, fresh ginger root, garlic and crushed red pepper flakes. Place in an appropriately sized sealed container with desired type of meat. Shake well to coat. Allow meat to marinate in the mixture at least two hours before cooking.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh ginger root, finely chopped
title: Teriyaki Marinade with Ginger and Garlic
